inclusion.criterion: Menstrual cycle length between 23 and 35 days
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Had two natural cycles prior to study participation
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Using non-hormonal contraception to avoid pregnancy OR abstaining from intercourse for the last three months and the present cycle
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Unwilling to provide written informed consent to participate in the study or comply with study procedures
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Has menopausal symptoms such as night sweats or hot flushes
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Using any hormonal treatments e.g. hormonal contraception, fertility treatments and hormone replacement therapy (except thyroxin)
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has history of acne and mild hirsutism, elevated testosterone levels, and a macroadenoma with no invasion.
